comprehensive_overview: FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing. It contains tools to filter, reformat, trim, barcode-split, etc, enabling the user to quickly perform quality control and manipulation tasks on high-throughput sequencing data.
core_features: Quality assessment and control of Next-Generation Sequencing data
Trimming reads based on quality scores
Sequence filtering based on various criteria
